# we-list-group



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                | Description                                       |
| ------------------- | ------------------------------------------------- |
| `--align-items`     | Align items of list group <br> Default: unset     |
| `--display`         | Display of list group <br> Default: flex          |
| `--flex-direction`  | Flex direction of list group <br> Default: column |
| `--justify-content` | Justify content of list grou <br> Default: unset  |


----------------------------------------------
